pricing.heading: Simple pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: Most landing pages are completed within 3-5 business days from final content approval.

items.question: Can I make changes after delivery?
items.answer: Yes, each plan includes revision rounds. You receive the source code to make updates yourself.

items.question: What do I need to provide?
items.answer: Content, branding assets, and your goals. We handle design, development, and optimization.
